name: action-version
description: GitHub Action for automated version bumping and dependency management in monorepos using Conventional Commits.

scripts.build: tsc && ncc build dist/index.js -s -o dist --source-map && mv dist/index.js dist/index.cjs && sed -i '' 's/sourceMappingURL=index.js.map/sourceMappingURL=index.cjs.map/' dist/index.cjs && mv dist/index.js.map dist/index.cjs.map
scripts.build:ncc: ncc build dist/index.js -s -o dist --source-map && mv dist/index.js dist/index.cjs && sed -i '' 's/sourceMappingURL=index.js.map/sourceMappingURL=index.cjs.map/' dist/index.cjs && mv dist/index.js.map dist/index.cjs.map
